var displayCreatedAt=function displayCreatedAt(createdAt){var time=new Date(createdAt);time.setHours(time.getHours()+9);// 한국 시간대로 맞추기 위해 9시간을 더함.
var milliSeconds=new Date()-time;var seconds=milliSeconds/1000;var minutes=seconds/60;var hours=minutes/60;var days=hours/24;var weeks=days/7;var months=days/30;var years=days/365;if(seconds<60)return"".concat(seconds," secs ago");if(minutes<60)return"".concat(Math.floor(minutes)," min ago");if(hours<24)return"".concat(Math.floor(hours)," hour ago");if(days<7)return"".concat(Math.floor(days)," day ago");if(weeks<5)return"".concat(Math.floor(weeks)," week ago");if(months<12)return"".concat(Math.floor(months)," month ago");if(years<2)return"".concat(Math.floor(years)," year ago");return"".concat(time);};export default displayCreatedAt;
